thread.title: Lady Gaga Is the Mother of All Monsters at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga Is the Mother of All Monsters at the Grammys

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Lady Gaga Is the Mother of All Monsters at the Grammys
text:
Lady Gaga at the 2017 Grammys Lady Gaga Is the Mother of All Monsters at the Grammys   Lady Gaga Is the Mother of All Monsters at the Grammys 
Lady Gaga channeled her inner punk rocker when she attended the Grammys on Sunday night. Wearing a revealing black top, short shorts, tall leather boots, and newly pink hair, the " Million Reasons " singer looked too cool for school as she strutted her stuff on the red carpet. Not only did she pose alongside Metallica ahead of their performance tonight, but she even showed off her brand-new moth tattoo that she got to celebrate the special occasion.
